name: Neon's Racer
description:
The game has a very simple theme, after all, it was created to be simple, fun and challenging.
Basically the player selects a car and its color in the main menu, then clicks Start Game, to start the race.

It is necessary to sidestep the obstacles and collect the gallons of gasoline. The game stores its highest score.

Score
At each collision with obstacles, the player loses 150 score. When the score reaches zero, of game over.

Gasoline
In order for the car to continue working perfectly, it is necessary to collect the fuel gallons, they provide a recharge between 50 and 75. With each gallon collected, the score increases between 100 and 125.
